The qoi for these results was the real part of the integral of u (turns out there was a bug in the code)
Test script git hash was 7a66e30
Parameters for investigate_error were:
h_spec = (1.0,-1.5)
J_range = [10]
nu = 2 # 2 shifts in randomised QMC
M_range = [10] # 2**10 points for each QMC approx (2 thereof), 2*(2**10) points for MC solves.
delta = 2.0
lambda_mult = 1.0
qoi = 'integral'

Admittedly this was run pre-tests, but the tests didn't (I think) turn up anything majorly wrong.
